name: Pew Pew Battle Colosseum
description:
Pew Pew Battle Colosseum is a funny 2D PvP Shooter in a distinct comic book style arena. Use the recoil of your weapon to navigate through a low gravity environment and shoot your opponents down.

  • 2-4 Players
  • Local multiplayer
  • Platform: PC
  • X-box controller needed

The game includes:

  • 12 different playable characters
  • 5 Game modes

We are Toastboat Games, a Berlin based team, currently studying at Games Academy.
